name: Next
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Recommended monitor: 16:9, 16:10
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX 2.4Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Recommended monitor: 16:9, 16:10
